RainbruRPG::Terminal::Menu

RainbruRPG::Terminal::Menu Class Reference

#include <menu.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Terminal::Menu:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The menu used with the MenuBar class.

This is a vertical list of MenuItem. We can add some MenuItem classes with the addItem() method.

We must know the largestItem of the menu to set the width of the menu window.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Menu::addItem ( MenuItem *  i  ) 

Adds a MenuItem to he Menu.

It first increase the value of height. Then it push_back() the MenuItem in itemList. Finally, if the lenght of the i->getName() is bigger than width, width is up to date.

Parameters:
i the MenuItem to be added.
